# init(configuration:)

**Initializer**

Creates a USB mass storage device with the provided configuration.

## Declaration

```swift
init(configuration: VZUSBMassStorageDeviceConfiguration)
```

## Parameters

- **configuration**: The USB mass storage configuration.
title: init(configuration:)
